detaileddescription.para: Theme function for all TripalFieldWidget objects.
Implements hook_bundle_create().
This is a Tripal defined hook and is called in the TripalBundleController::create() function to allow modules to perform tasks when a bundle is created.
Implements hook_field_create_instance().
Implements hook_field_formatter_info().
Implements hook_field_formatter_info_alter();
Implements hook_field_formatter_settings_form().
Implements hook_field_formatter_settings_summary().
Implements hook_field_formatter_view().
Implements hook_field_info().

We want the Tripal module to handle all TripalFields. This will allow other modules to be more easily disabled/enabled because Drupal won't let a module be disabled if it supports fields that are actively attached to bundles. Therefore any module that provides a new TripalField will be discovered and listed for Drupal by this function.
Implements hook_info_alter().
Implements hook_instance_settings_form()
Allows for altering of a field's instance setting form.
This appears to be a Drupal hook but is actually a custom function created by this module. It is called by the tripal_form_alter() function of this module.
Here we put additional form elements for any field, regardless if it is a tripalField or not.

parameterdescription.para: The form array. Alterations to the form can be made within this array.

detaileddescription.para: Implements a process function for the instance settings form.
See the comment in the tripal_field_instance_settings_form_alter() for more details.
Validate our custom instance settings form fields.
Custom submit function for instance settings form.
Validates the TripalField instance settings form.
This function is called because the TripalField::instanceSettingsForm() adds it to the form element. By default, Drupal does not provide a validate hook for the instance settings form.
Implements hook_field_is_empty().
Simple provides a message indicating that the field cannot be deleted.
This function is used in the tripal_menu_alter() function. We alter the menu created for managing fields to use this call back which prints a message that the field cannot be deleted.
Implements hook_field_settings_form()
Implements hook_field_settings_form_validate().
This function is called because the TripalField::settingsForm() adds it to the form element. By default, Drupal does not provide a validate hook for the settings form.
Implements hook_field_validate()
Implements hook_field_views_data();
Implements hook_field_widget_form().
Implements hook_field_widget_form_alter().
Implements hook_field_widget_info();
Implements hook_field_widget_info_alter();
Implements an AJAX callback for the tripal_field_vocab_select_term_form.
Implements hook_form_FORM_ID_alter().
The field_ui_display_overview_form is used for formatting the display or layout of fields attached to an entity and shown on the entity view page.
This function removes the cvterm class and property adder field as those are really not meant for users to show or manage.
Implements hook_form_FORM_ID_alter().
The field_ui_field_overview_form_ is used for adding and reordering the fields attached to a bundle. It also includes edit and delete links and links for editing field types and widgets.
This alter function is used to add a new 'Supported By' column to the table to let the user know where fields are storing their data.
A submit function for the field_ui_field_overview_form.
Implements hook_module_implements_alter()
We want our edits to the field_ui_field_overview_form form to occur after all modules have implemented their changes.
